projects.title: Goodreads Book List
projects.bodyText: This is a full-stack web app with React, Express, and Mongoose. There are some APIs that scrape book-related meta-data from https://www.goodreads.com/ and populate data into https://cloud.mongodb.com. In frontend, the book list is shown category-wise.

projects.title: Movie Catalog App
projects.bodyText: This website is a movie catalog built on data from The Movie Database (TMDB). Users can explore movies by category and navigate within categories. The movie details page provides in-depth information, including cast, trailers, and recommendations.
